column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Zuko says : " Welcome back . "
#Text=Aang says : " It 's good to be back . "
#Text=Zuko says : " That wo n't be enough to escape . "
#Text=Aang says : " Appa ! "
#Text=Zuko says : " Here for a rematch ? "
#Text=Katara says : " Trust me Zuko , it 's not going to be much of a match . "
#Text=Sokka says : " Hey , this is some quality rope ! "
#Text=Aang says : " We need to get to the oasis ; the spirits are in trouble ! "
#Text=Aang says : " Wait , we ca n't just leave him here . "
#Text=Sokka says : " Sure we can .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Yeah , this makes a lot of sense .
#Text=Let 's bring the guy who 's constantly trying to kill us .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Are you okay ?
#Text=" Yue says : " I feel faint .
#Text=" Aang says : " I feel it , too .
#Text=The Moon Spirit is in trouble .
#Text=" Yue says : " I owe the Moon Spirit my life .
#Text=" Sokka says : " What do you mean ?
#Text=" Yue says : " When I was born I was very sick and very weak .
#Text=Most babies cry when they 're born , but I was born as if I was asleep , my eyes closed .
#Text=Our healers did everything they could .
#Text=They told my mother and father I was going to die .
#Text=My father pleaded with the spirits to save me .
#Text=That night , beneath the full moon , he brought me to the oasis and placed me in the pond .
#Text=My dark hair turned white .
#Text=I opened my eyes and began to cry , and they knew I would live .
#Text=That 's why my mother named me Yue .
#Text=For the moon .
#Text=" Zhao says : " I am ... a legend , now !
#Text=The Fire Nation will , for generations , tell stories about the great Zhao , who darkened the moon .
#Text=They will call me , Zhao the Conqueror , Zhao the Moon Slayer , Zhao the Invincible !
#Text=Ugh ... Get it off !
#Text=Get it off !
#Text="
